summary: WILE DRIVING UPHILL TRANSMISSION AGGRESSIVELY DOWN SHIFTS TO 3RD GEAR PUTTING CAR INTO LIMP MODE ALWAYS HAPPENS WILE GOING UP HILL ITS DANGEROUS NO RECALLS FOR THIS TRANSMISSION ISSUES, HAPPEND TO ME MULTIPLE TIMES CAR IT'S NOT SAFE TO DRIVE ONES I PULL OVER SHUT DOWN ENGINE AND STARD AGAIN CALL DRIVES NORMAL FOR A COUPLE OF MILES THEN ISSUE COMES BACK CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ON, AND TRACTION CONTROL LIGHT COMES ON, WITH ABS LIGHT TRANSMISSION WONT GO UP OR DOWN 3RD GEAR
